SEARCH
Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
class Game represents an instance of the game MyShelfie, provides as public the methods to update the whole model.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<String> players, boolean isTest) throws ShelfCreationException, PlayersEmptyException, NotTestException
      Constructor used for testing.
      Parameters:
      players - is list containing every player name (takes as guaranteed they are unique)
      isTest - used to differentiate the constructor used only for tests, it has to be true to use the constructor
      Throws:
      ShelfCreationException - if the number of players is not correct
      PlayersEmptyException - if a player is null
      NotTestException - if this constructor is used but isTest is false

    • Game

      public Game(List<String> players) throws ShelfCreationException, PlayersEmptyException
      constructor of game
      Parameters:
      players - is list containing every player name (takes as guaranteed they are unique)
      Throws:
      ShelfCreationException - if the list has the wrong length
      PlayersEmptyException - if the list of players contains invalid player

  • Method Details

    • updateCurrentPlayer

      public void updateCurrentPlayer(String name) throws InvalidPlayerNameException
      updates the player which has the right to move to the player with the specified name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player which has now the right to move
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNameException - if the name is empty or null

    • moveTiles

      public void moveTiles(List<Tile> tiles, int shelfColumn, String name) throws InvalidPlayerNameException, PlayerNotCurrentException, NotInLineException, NoFreeEdgeException, OutOfBoundException, NullPointerException, FullColumnException, NullTilesException, PlayerNotOnlineException, InvalidTileException
      updates the internal state of model, method models the only move a player can make
      Parameters:
      tiles - tiles to be moved, in the order the player decides to insert them into his own shelf
      shelfColumn - number corresponding to the selected column of the player's shelf
      name - name of the player that will make its move
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNameException - is thrown if the name specified is not registered in this game instance
      PlayerNotCurrentException - is thrown if it is NOT the turn of the player specified
      NullTilesException - is thrown if the list of tiles passed contains a null element
      InvalidPlayerNameException - if the name of the player making the move is null or empty
      NotInLineException - if the move requires taking tiles that are not in line
      NoFreeEdgeException - if the move require taking tiles that have no free edges
      OutOfBoundException - if the move require taking tiles that are placed outside the board
      FullColumnException - if the move require placing tiles in a column that has not enough space
      PlayerNotOnlineException - if the player making the move is recorded as offline in the model
      InvalidTileException - if the tiles requested does not correspond to the one in the game board
      NullPointerException

    • getOnlinePlayers

      public List<String> getOnlinePlayers()
      getter method of attribute: OnlinePlayer
      Returns:
      List of all the names of "online" player (players who have NOT disconnected)

      public Map<String,TilesType[][]> getShelves()
      getter for the shelves of all player
      Returns:
      return an HashMap where the keys are the players' names and the values are their shelves

    • getCommonGoalPoints

      public Map<String,int[]> getCommonGoalPoints()
      getter for the points scored by all player regarding common goals
      Returns:
      an HashMap with the name of the player as key and an int[2] with the points as value

    • getEndGame

      public boolean getEndGame()
      getter for the endgame boolean value
      Returns:
      true iff the game is ended

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(String name) throws InvalidPlayerNameException
      removes the player with the specified name from the OnlinePlayers list
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the player to disconnect
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNameException - thrown if the name specified is not associated with any player of the game

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String name) throws InvalidPlayerNameException
      adds back a previously disconnected player with the specified name to the OnlinePlayers list
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the player to reconnect to the game
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNameException - thrown if the name specified is not associated with any player of the game

    • searchPlayer

      public Player searchPlayer(String name) throws InvalidPlayerNameException
      private method used to retrieve the reference of a player from its name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player to return
      Returns:
      Player object instance whose attribute Player.name is the same as parameter name
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNameException - if the requested name is empty or null
